Name: GFPS-AU - Electrofusion Installation Checklist
Details
General Details
Installation Date:
Welder’s Name:
Preparation, Inspection & Materials
Pipe and fitting Batch No recorded?
Has the pipe been prepared (cleaned, inspected for dimensions and surface, cut square, deburred) and its condition (ovality, reversion) checked?
Has the fitting been inspected (SDR range checked, condition confirmed) and the peeling length measured, marked, and executed with a sharp blade?
Installation and Welding
Have the peeled areas been cleaned, insertion depth marked, and pipe insertion verified for proper alignment and annular gap? (add photo)
Has the electrofusion welding process been completed according to the manufacturer's instructions without error messages? (add photo)
Post-Weld Inspection
After welding, has the joint been thoroughly inspected for overall quality, including uniform appearance, proper alignment, and adherence to specifications without visible defects? (add photo)
Has a pressure test been performed on the welded joint to ensure its integrity and leak-free performance? (add photo)
ITP 01 - Soft Landscaping - Landscaping
ON-STRUCTURE GARDEN BED & PLANTER INFILL
1 - Installation of Insulation Layer (for Green Roof Only)
Acceptance Criteria: 20mm insulation layer correctly installed, inspected, and approved by foreman. Photo evidence and docket.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
2 - Installation of Coreflute
Acceptance Criteria: Coreflute installed as per specifications, inspected, and approved by foreman. Photo evidence.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
3 - Geo-fabric Laying
Acceptance Criteria: Geo-fabric properly laid out, inspected, and approved by foreman. Photo evidence.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
4 - Drainage Cell Installation
Acceptance Criteria: Drainage cells installed correctly, inspected, and approved by foreman. Photo evidence.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
5 - Soil and Mulch Type Verification
Acceptance Criteria: Soil and mulch added to specified levels, correct type, inspected, and approved by foreman. Docket to be retained.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
PLANTING
1 - Delivered Plant Health Inspection
Acceptance Criteria: Health and accuracy verified, approved by foreman.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
2 - Verification of Plant Layout According to Design
Acceptance Criteria: Plant placement matches the design plans, approved by foreman and client.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
3 - Tree Securing and Stability Inspection
Acceptance Criteria: Anchoring methods inspected, approved by foreman.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
4 - Installation and Inspection of Tree Inspection Risers
Acceptance Criteria: One inspection riser per tree within planters installed and inspected for compliance with specifications.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
HANDOVER
1 - ITP and Handover Approval
Acceptance Criteria: ITP reviewed with client, all sections signed off.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance, Client - Surveillance

ITP 04 - Irrigation
PRELIMINARY APPROVALS
1 - Design Review and Approval

Acceptance Criteria: Irrigation design drawing has been approved - ensure design meets plumbing requirements and is suitable for intended irrigation needs. Review by licensed plumber and sign off by client.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
2 - Material Review and Approval
Acceptance Criteria: Irrigation material samples and material types have been approved
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
3 - Coordination and Permit Acquisition for Live Area Work
Acceptance Criteria: All necessary permits for work within live areas obtained. Compliance with zoning and site work plans documented through coordination efforts.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
MATERIAL INSPECTION
1 - Inspection of Delivered Materials

Acceptance Criteria: Upon delivery of piping, fittings, valves, and other materials. Check for damage, ensure specifications (size, material type) match the project requirements, and materials meet approvals.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
PENETRATIONS
1 - Review of Scanning Reports for Area Penetration
Acceptance Criteria: Scanning reports for areas to be penetrated are reviewed to ensure avoidance of existing services and structural elements.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
2 - Engineering Approval
Acceptance Criteria: Obtain approval from a licensed engineer for all proposed penetrations, ensuring they do not compromise structural integrity or interfere with other building services.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
3 - Penetration Execution (Peno)
Acceptance Criteria: Proceed with penetrations only after engineering approval and successful scanning.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
4 - Waterproofing Coordination
Acceptance Criteria: Verify waterproofing has been completed by the designated contractor and ensure its integration with our scope of work is documented.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
IRRIGATION INSTALLATION
1 - Rough-In Plumbing Installation
Acceptance Criteria: Poly pipework for water points is installed according to approved design, securely and correctly. Installation is visually inspected and approved by site plumber.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
2 - Vertical Cabling for Irrigation Control
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure vertical cabling to centralized controllers is installed using scissor lifts or similar equipment under strict safety controls, with all installations matching the design.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
3 - Dripline Irrigation System Installation
Acceptance Criteria: Dripline system is installed as per design, with secure placement and proper connection to water sources. System passes visual inspection, ensuring it's ready for testing.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
4 - System Testing and Commissioning

Acceptance Criteria: The irrigation system undergoes pressure testing for leaks and functional testing of automation. Testing results meet project standards, ensuring system is operational and effective.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
HANDOVER
1 - ITP and Handover Approval
Acceptance Criteria: ITP reviewed with client, all sections signed off.
Assignees and Verification Method: Client - Surveillance, Internal - Surveillance
ITP-05 - Planter Fabrication (TRJ)
Fabrication Inspection
1 - Type of Planter
Type of Planter:
Acceptance Criteria: Note the type of planter being inspected by project code.
2 - Shop Drawings Approval
Acceptance Criteria: All shop drawings submitted and approved.
3 - Physical Samples Approval / Selections of Material including Color
Acceptance Criteria: Physical samples, material types, and color selections submitted and approved including Prototype.
4 - TRJ Inspection Completion
Acceptance Criteria: TRJ inspection report confirms quantity, measurements, thickness, and weld quality as per approved shop drawings.
5 - Paint Quality and Application
Acceptance Criteria: The color and application of paint are correct, matching design specifications without defects.
6 - Waterproofing Verification and Water Test
Acceptance Criteria: Waterproofing is correctly applied and has passed water testing for leaks and durability.
7 - Quantity of Production Verification
Acceptance Criteria: The quantity of produced planters aligns with the order specifications.
